title: Ep. 33 "The Power of the P"
description:
This week Kiki and Medinah discuss the advantages of being women. Well...if you know how to work it right. The power of the "P" is one powerful private part. Listen and laugh as the ladies tell personal stories about times when they they had the power, and other times where they ended up with nothing but $20 for a sew in."
